Source code for farm_animals

from animal import Animal

# Each animal type inherits from the base Animal class
# They don't need any special methods, so we just use 'pass'



[docs]
class Cow(Animal):
    """A cow animal type"""
    pass





[docs]
class Chicken(Animal):
    """A chicken animal type"""
    pass





[docs]
class Sheep(Animal):
    """A sheep animal type"""
    pass





[docs]
class Pig(Animal):
    """A pig animal type"""
    pass





[docs]
class Horse(Animal):
    """A horse animal type"""
    pass
